name: WallWar
overview: Wall War is a 1-player versus computer arcade game for the Atari The player controls a small robot, which is separated by a 4-layered, multicolored, moving wall from an opponent. The player can move horizontally, and can fire shots vertically towards their opponent. Intermittently, laser shots will shoot from the turrets horizontal to the player, and push them to the left or right. Once the wall is destroyed, the player injures their opponent by placing shots in the multi-color field behind them, causing the field to drain. When the field is drained, the player loses.
